title: u guys need to leave sharbyque alone wtf
body: tbh u fucking trolls think its fucking funny to make sharbyu cry? she sfucking tearing up on skype call atm i hope u fucking kids are happy  do u fucking know what she goes through she ahs ucking social anxiety and comes to the forums to get away from docuhebags and then suddenly these douchebags are here now too? fuck off it isnt fucking funny sharby isnt a shitposter shes a plusposter so dont even compare her to these shitposters
